customer_reviews.title: Be careful..
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful with this product. The scrubbing pads are made with a chemical called SLS. This is common chemical in floor cleaners and jet fuel. SLS is highly corrosive. It's added to beauty products to break down the skin for better absorption. Using this product, burned my face severely. My entire face was broken out in sunburn like blisters. Both of my eyes are now extremely sensitive and painful. I gave a two star review because the product matches the description, the packaging was flawless, and everything was included. My reaction to this product was so bad, I thought I was going to have to seek medical attention.
